name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Software Engineer with 8 years of experience specializing in back-end and full-stack development using **Python**, **Node.js**, and **PostgreSQL**. Proficient in building and integrating APIs and maintaining Linux servers, I leverage a robust understanding of networking protocols including SMTP, IMAP, SPF, DKIM, and DMARC for comprehensive email handling solutions. My experience extends to implementing queue management systems, rate limiting, and bounce processing to optimize email analytics and anti-abuse systems.

Adept in continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, I have hands-on expertise in containerization technologies such as **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, enhancing development efficiency and application scalability. I emphasize automation and system orchestration built on microservices architecture and event-driven systems, ensuring reliability and compliance with standards.

Additionally, I excel in shell scripting and support the swift deployment of solutions, showcasing a solid foundation in modern development methodologies. My passion for leveraging technology is further underscored by a history of driving innovative solutions in various sectors.
